1.Description: Blaze a trail as one of the first of a new group of pioneers.

-1.RewardDescription: An exclusive golden edition of the iconic Alpha Vector Starship<>, commemorating completion of the inaugural Expedition<>, 'Pioneers'. This highly-manoeuvrable spacecraft is constructed from a durable and precious alloy, and coated in a tough layer of fibrous insulation to endure many lifetimes' worth of rigorous space exploration. Claim<> this ship to add it to your collection, or Exchange<> it with your current ship. While on a planet, summon ships from the Quick Menu (QUICK_MENU<>).

5.RewardDescription:
Equip this exclusive <STELLAR>Personal Flair<> in commemoration of the inaugural <STELLAR>Expedition<>, 'Pioneers'.
Apply this banner to your profile at an <TECHNOLOGY>Appearance Modifier<>.

An exclusive placeable decal, to add flair and decoration to bases.
This decal features the golden edition of the iconic Alpha Vector Starship, and commemorates completion of the inaugural <STELLAR>Expedition<>, 'Pioneers'.

An exclusive <STELLAR>Explorer Title<>, commemorating completion of the inaugural <STELLAR>Expedition<>, 'Pioneers'.

Apply this title to your banner at an <TECHNOLOGY>Appearance Modifier<>.

4.RewardDescription:
An exclusive <STELLAR>Exosuit Appearance Override<>.

A streamlined and lightweight backpack unit, featuring an elegant single-thruster design. This exclusive exosuit augmentation commemorates completion of the inaugural <STELLAR>Expedition<>, 'Pioneers'.

Transform the appearance of your Exosuit at an <TECHNOLOGY>Appearance Modifier<>.

3.RewardDescription:
An aggressive <STELLAR>Exosuit Appearance Override<>, modeled on the war helmets of the ancient Gek. This special edition is cast in a durable and precious alloy.

Transform the appearance of your Exosuit at an <TECHNOLOGY>Appearance Modifier<>.

2.RewardDescription:
An exclusive buildable base ornament.
This elaborate, <STELLAR>gold-fringed flag<> features a rendition of the iconic Alpha Vector Starship. Plant in a habitable base to commemorate completion of the inaugural <STELLAR>Expedition<>, 'Pioneers'.

1.RewardDescription: A three-variety pack of luxury fireworks. These stunning pyrotechnics render the likeness of an Atlas Interface, in bursts of indium<>, gold<> and cadmium<>. Ignite to create glittering displays in the sky. Place launch tube via the Build Menu<> (BUILD_MENU<>). Warning<>: Aim away from living creatures. Not recommended for indoor use.

2.Description: Delve into the mystery of a starship from another universe...

-1.RewardDescription:
The <TECHNOLOGY>SSV Normandy SR1<> is a one-of-a-kind 'deep scout' frigate. This legendary ship represents peace and cooperation between races, and commemorates completion of the 'Beachhead' <STELLAR>Expedition<>.

Recruiting this frigate will add it to your fleet. Manage your frigate fleet from a <TECHNOLOGY>Fleet Command Room<> aboard your freighter, and consult your <TECHNOLOGY>Navigator<> to deploy frigates on lucrative expeditions.

An exclusive <STELLAR>Explorer Title<>, commemorating completion of the 'Beachhead' <STELLAR>Expedition<>, and your success in tracking the <SPECIAL>renegade historical echo<>.

Apply this title to your banner at an <TECHNOLOGY>Appearance Modifier<>.

An exclusive <STELLAR>Explorer Title<>, commemorating completion of the 'Beachhead' <STELLAR>Expedition<>, and your success in tracking the <SPECIAL>renegade historical echo<>.

Apply this title to your banner at an <TECHNOLOGY>Appearance Modifier<>.

5.RewardDescription:
Equip this exclusive <STELLAR>Personal Flair<> in commemoration of the 'Beachhead' <STELLAR>Expedition<>, and your success in tracking the <SPECIAL>renegade historical echo<>.

Apply this banner to your profile at an <TECHNOLOGY>Appearance Modifier<>.

An exclusive placeable decal, to add flair and decoration to bases.

This decal commemorates the collective effort of the Travellers in mapping the <SPECIAL>Histiographical Flux<> and tracking the renegade echo during the <STELLAR>Beachhead<> Expedition.

Nada has detected a new pattern emerging in the stories of the <TRANS_TRA>Gek<>, <TRANS_EXP>Korvax<>, and <TRANS_WAR>Vy'keen<>.

The dosimeter measures exposure to <SPECIAL>historiographical flux<> around key artifact sites. Recordings of unusual historical shifts will enable Nada to trace the signal.

Assist Nada and Polo in their research by using this device to <STELLAR>transmit historial data<> from alien artifact sites.

3.Description: Explore a planet in detail as you struggle to escape its surface.

-1.RewardDescription:
A living, fertile egg, <TRADEABLE>ready to hatch!<>

A shadow writhes beneath the egg's protective membrane.

Scans indicate the being within has the genetic potential to be <FUEL>nightmarish<> and <FUEL>soul-consuming<>.

5.RewardDescription:
Equip this exclusive <STELLAR>Personal Flair<> in commemoration of the 'Cartographers' <STELLAR>Expedition<>, and your success in documenting and then escaping from the expedition planet.

Apply this banner to your profile at an <TECHNOLOGY>Appearance Modifier<>.

An exclusive placeable decal, to add flair and decoration to bases.

This decal commemorates your success in documenting and then escaping from the expedition planet.

An exclusive <STELLAR>Explorer Title<>, commemorating completion of the 'Cartographers' <STELLAR>Expedition<>, and your success in documenting and then escaping from the expedition planet.

Apply this title to your banner at an <TECHNOLOGY>Appearance Modifier<>.

4.RewardDescription: This fungal growth, identifiable by its wide, smooth cap and luminescent pores, is native to a variety of cave biomes. Saucer Fungi enjoy a symbiotic relationship with many species of burrowing creatures.
A hardy variety of lampenflora. This creeping vine occurs naturally in damp, subterranean environments, but will thrive as a free-standing shrub in any biome type.
This attractive glowing flower is remarkable for its scent, reminiscent of freshly tilled soil. Due to the plant's mineral-rich diet, the stamens often contain traces of cobalt.
Clusters of these large mushrooms can be found growing in underground caves. The surface 'veins' form part of an unusual gill structure, releasing spores from both above and below the fungus's cap.
This stalagmite was formed by the dripping of cobalt-rich moisture over several millennia. It is eternally cold to the touch, as though the rock recalls the temperature of its home cave.

3.RewardDescription:
A secure biological containment vessel, complete with its own purified internal atmosphere.

Pre-installed bioluminescent insects provide a soft, flickering light, perfect for those seeking natural lighting for their base.

2.RewardDescription:
A decorative model of a star system, complete with holographic representations of various stellar objects.

A small, self-contained, perpetual motion device generates the small amount of power required to continue the projection.

1.RewardDescription:
An exclusive <STELLAR>Exosuit Appearance Override<>.

Specially conditioned oil is added to the jetpack's exhaust jets, creating a stream of pearlescent bubbles as it operates.

Transform the appearance of your Exosuit at an <TECHNOLOGY>Appearance Modifier<>.

4.Description: Face the titan worm and its many-mouthed vessels.

-1.RewardDescription:
A living, fertile egg, <TRADEABLE>ready to hatch!<>

Curled within the shell is a hungry wormlet, its coils rippling restlessly.

Scans indicate the being within has the genetic potential to be <FUEL>cursed<> and <FUEL>insatiable<>.

5.RewardDescription:
Equip this exclusive <STELLAR>Personal Flair<> in commemoration of the <STELLAR>Emergence<> expedition.
Apply this banner to your profile at an <TECHNOLOGY>Appearance Modifier<>.

An exclusive placeable decal, to add flair and decoration to bases.

This decal commemorates completion of the <STELLAR>Emergence<> expedition.

An exclusive <STELLAR>Explorer Title<>, commemorating completion of the <STELLAR>Emergence<> expedition.

Apply this title to your banner at an <TECHNOLOGY>Appearance Modifier<>.

4.RewardDescription:
An exclusive <STELLAR>Exosuit Appearance Override<>.

Redistribute your facial organs and alarm other explorers by assuming the appearance of a sandworm cultist. This bio-silicone helmet is sealed against all known planetary hazards, but may feel slightly clammy to the wearer.

Ritualistically transform the head of your <STELLAR>Vy'keen<> appearance at an <TECHNOLOGY>Appearance Modifier<>.

3.RewardDescription:
An exclusive buildable base ornament.

This many-toothed skull once belonged to a large legless vertebrate, cousin to the titan sandworm. The powerful jaws can exert enough force to crush a Multi-Tool, and the bones of most creatures.

2.RewardDescription:
An exclusive <STELLAR>Exosuit Appearance Override<>.

Attaches an active bio-chamber to the Jetpack's exhaust nozzles. During flight, the thrusters warm and expel the slimy juice contained within.
<STELLAR>Note<>: Contains living worms. Ejected worms may infest local ecosystems.

Transform the appearance of your Exosuit at an <TECHNOLOGY>Appearance Modifier<>.

1.RewardDescription: A pack of luxury fireworks. These organic pyrotechnics rocket into the sky and explode in a splatter of slime, mucus, and wormlets. Ignite to create disgusting displays in the sky. Place launch tube via the Build Menu<> (BUILD_MENU<>). Warning<>: Aim away from living creatures. Not recommended for indoor use.

5.Description: Befriend, nurture, and interact with the creatures of the universe in a gentle journey of discovery.

-1.RewardDescription:
A metal 'egg' capsule, <TRADEABLE>ready to hatch!<>

The shell crackles with an electronic energy.

Scans indicate the being within is programmed to be <SPECIAL>tireless<> and <SPECIAL>watchful<>.

5.RewardDescription:
Equip this exclusive <STELLAR>Personal Flair<> in commemoration of the 'Exobiology' <STELLAR>Expedition<>, and your explorations into the diverse wildlife inhabiting the universe.

Apply this banner to your profile at an <TECHNOLOGY>Appearance Modifier<>.

An exclusive placeable decal, to add flair and decoration to bases.

This decal commemorates completion of the <STELLAR>Exobiology<> expedition, and celebrates the peaceful co-existence of Travellers with the countless species of wildlife inhabiting the universe.

An exclusive <STELLAR>Explorer Title<>, commemorating completion of the <STELLAR>Exobiology<> expedition.

Apply this title to your banner at an <TECHNOLOGY>Appearance Modifier<>.

4.RewardDescription:
An exclusive <STELLAR>Exosuit Appearance Override<>.

An elegant wing-assisted jetpack, inspired by the design philosophy of exotic starships. This exclusive exosuit augmentation commemorates completion of the 'Exobiology' <STELLAR>Expedition<>.

Transform the appearance of your Exosuit at an <TECHNOLOGY>Appearance Modifier<>.

3.RewardDescription:
An exclusive <STELLAR>Companion Appearance Enhancement<>. Ideal for fierce-tempered companions, this stylish plate armour protects vital organs against laser and projectile fire. Ultra-soft breathable padding reduces the likelihood of companions wriggling out of the accessory.

Earn the trust of wild animals to adopt companions. Interact with companions to customise their appearance.

2.RewardDescription:
An exclusive piece of self-adhesive, crease-proof wall art.
This adrenaline-fueled poster depicts two noble herd leaders clashing over territory.

An exclusive piece of self-adhesive, crease-proof wall art.
A reminder of what lurks in the depths below.

An exclusive piece of self-adhesive, crease-proof wall art.
This golden poster evokes the of nostalgia of long summer days.

1.RewardDescription:
An exclusive <STELLAR>Exosuit Appearance Override<>.

The jetpack exhaust is fitted with a high-concentrate pugneum dispenser. When the jets are activated, the resulting reaction carves miniature distortions in reality, and creates an interesting visual effect.

Transform the appearance of your Exosuit at an <TECHNOLOGY>Appearance Modifier<>.

6.Description: Hunt down a rampaging pirate faction and uncover their secret treasure.

-1.RewardDescription:
An exclusive <STELLAR>Exosuit Appearance Override<>.

A battle-worn cape, stolen from notorious pirate faction <SPECIAL>The Blight<>. Woven from chemically-dipped nano-fibres, the fabric is completely impervious to the heat produced by jetpack exhaust.

Transform the appearance of your Exosuit at an <TECHNOLOGY>Appearance Modifier<>.

5.RewardDescription:
Equip this exclusive <STELLAR>Personal Flair<> in commemoration of the 'Blighted' <STELLAR>Expedition<>, the glorious retrieval of ill-gotten lucre, and the discovery of a pirate secret.

Apply this banner to your profile at an <TECHNOLOGY>Appearance Modifier<>.

An exclusive placeable decal, to add flair and decoration to bases.

This decal commemorates completion of the <STELLAR>Blighted<> expedition, the glorious retrieval of ill-gotten lucre, and the discovery of a pirate secret.

An exclusive <STELLAR>Explorer Title<>, commemorating completion of the <STELLAR>Blighted<> expedition, the glorious retrieval of ill-gotten lucre, and the discovery of a pirate secret.

Apply this title to your banner at an <TECHNOLOGY>Appearance Modifier<>.

4.RewardDescription:
An exclusive buildable base ornament.

This cubic lifeform drifted into an orbital station from another reality, where it was captured by a travelling merchant. Provides placid companionship when rehomed in a habitable base.

An anomalous egg. The shell is tough and leathery, and twitches when touched.

A faint tapping can be heard coming from within. From time to time, it appears to sing.

3.RewardDescription:
A contrasting green and purple design, this flag was inspired by those searching for verdant galaxies.

An exclusive buildable base ornament.

An abstract representation of planetary orbits under a watchful eye, sewn from striking crimson and grey fabrics.

An exclusive buildable base ornament.

This flag's delicate golden embroidery instantly adds elegance and refinement to any habitable base.

An exclusive buildable base ornament.

A collaboratively designed standard, resulting from the cooperation between several intergalactic guilds.

An exclusive buildable base ornament.

The bright red skull emblazoned on this velvety flag serves as a warning to hostile parties.

An exclusive buildable base ornament.

2.RewardDescription:
An exclusive piece of self-adhesive, crease-proof wall art.
This anarchistic poster depicts a notorious pirate-occupied planet.

An exclusive piece of self-adhesive, crease-proof wall art.
A rebellious tribute to pirates, fugitives, and resistance to Sentinel law.

An exclusive piece of self-adhesive, crease-proof wall art.
Few Vy'keen would be unfamiliar with Dread Captain Fahng and their bone-chilling exploits - though it is not known for certain whether they are a real historical figure, or simply a story made up to frighten disobedient cubs.

1.RewardDescription:
An exclusive <STELLAR>Starship Exhaust Modifier<>.

A ramshackle ship exhaust nozzle, hand-assembled in an emergency by an outlaw. Has an occasional propensity to explode, but with no adverse effect on flight handling.

Install this <TECHNOLOGY>technology<> in your starship inventory to change the appearance of the engine exhaust trails.

7.Description: DEATH IS NOT THE END<> SLASH<> THE LOOP CONTINUES<>

-1.RewardDescription:
This peaceful space giant is a mutation of organism and starcraft, and can be tamed to swim through the stars alongside a fleet of frigates.

Recruiting this creature will add it to your frigate fleet. Manage your fleet from a <TECHNOLOGY>Fleet Command Room<> aboard your freighter, and consult your <TECHNOLOGY>Navigator<> to deploy frigates on lucrative expeditions.

5.RewardDescription:
Equip this exclusive <STELLAR>Personal Flair<> in commemoration of the 'Leviathan' <STELLAR>Expedition<>, and the lifting of a generation-spanning curse.

Apply this banner to your profile at an <TECHNOLOGY>Appearance Modifier<>.

An exclusive placeable decal, to add flair and decoration to bases.

This decal commemorates completion of the <STELLAR>Leviathan<> expedition, and the lifting of a generation-spanning curse.

An exclusive <STELLAR>Explorer Title<>, commemorating completion of the <STELLAR>Leviathan<> expedition, and the lifting of a generation-spanning curse.

Apply this title to your banner at an <TECHNOLOGY>Appearance Modifier<>.

4.RewardDescription:
A juvenile cosmic leviathan, suitable for rehoming in a habitable base.

This mysterious creature is enclosed in a chrono-preservation field to ensure it remains eternally young, playful, and a manageable size.

3.RewardDescription:
An exclusive <STELLAR>Exosuit Appearance Override<>.

This sweeping cloak was once worn by an ill-fated Traveller - obsessed with their quest to capture a cosmic leviathan, and doomed to repeat the chase for all eternity.

Transform the appearance of your Exosuit at an <TECHNOLOGY>Appearance Modifier<>.

2.RewardDescription:
An exclusive <STELLAR>Starship Exhaust Modifier<>.

A cosmic resonance chamber interacts with starship exhaust, modifying propulsion energy to leave a streak of temporal disturbances.

Install this <TECHNOLOGY>technology<> in your starship inventory to change the appearance of the engine exhaust trails.

1.RewardDescription:
An exclusive piece of self-adhesive, crease-proof wall art.
This poster is a reminder of the non-linear nature of reality.

An exclusive piece of self-adhesive, crease-proof wall art.
This poster represents the reiterative nature of time.

An exclusive piece of self-adhesive, crease-proof wall art.
This poster depicts a pod of biological frigates gliding serenely through the cosmos.

8.Description: Cruise across the galaxy on an interstellar freighter voyage.

-1.RewardDescription:
A living, fertile egg, <TRADEABLE>ready to hatch!<>

Floating within the shell is a haunting glow, a beacon both beautiful and cursed.

Scans indicate the being within has the genetic potential to be <SPECIAL>gelatinous<> and <TECHNOLOGY>spectral<>.

5.RewardDescription:
Equip this exclusive <STELLAR>Personal Flair<> in commemoration of the 'Polestar' <STELLAR>Expedition<>, and the completion of a long cruise aboard a capital ship.

Apply this banner to your profile at an <TECHNOLOGY>Appearance Modifier<>.

An exclusive placeable decal, to add flair and decoration to bases.

This decal commemorates completion of the <STELLAR>Polestar<> expedition, and the completion of a long cruise aboard a capital ship.

An exclusive <STELLAR>Explorer Title<>, commemorating completion of the <STELLAR>Polestar<> expedition, and the completion of a long cruise aboard a capital ship.

Apply this title to your banner at an <TECHNOLOGY>Appearance Modifier<>.

4.RewardDescription:
An exclusive <STELLAR>Exosuit Appearance Override<>.

Master, commander, voyager of the stars. Don your cloak and prepare to take the helm.

Transform the appearance of your Exosuit at an <TECHNOLOGY>Appearance Modifier<>.

3.RewardDescription:
A arrangement of dynamic glass panels, each filled with undoubtedly useful and valuable information.

This display unit also functions as a source of illumination.

A low-tech heating device, ideal for generating light and heat without access to high-energy power sources.

User is advised to keep arms and legs outside of the barrel at all times.

A secure containment vessel, designed to provide a near-indestructible chamber for the storage of vital navigation charts.

Resilient and designed to last thousands of years, this archive is entirely free of electronic components.

2.RewardDescription:
An exclusive <STELLAR>Freighter Engine Flare Modifier<>.

High-energy exhaust gases rapid condense as they exit the freighter's colossal engines, collapsing into micro-singularities.

Transform the appearance of your freighter at the <TECHNOLOGY>Upgrade Control Terminal<> on the <VAL_ON>bridge<>.

1.RewardDescription:
An exclusive piece of self-adhesive, crease-proof wall art.

This poster is dedicated to the hard-working freighter crews who keep the universe fuelled and fed.

An exclusive piece of self-adhesive, crease-proof wall art.

This poster is dedicated to explorers and navigators who boldly seek out new horizons.

An exclusive piece of self-adhesive, crease-proof wall art.

This poster is dedicated to brave spacefarers who forge new paths across the galaxy.

9.Description: The Utopia Foundation welcomes all contributors to our ambitious new communal habitation project.

-1.RewardDescription: A unique and exclusive starship<>, commemorating completion of the Utopia<> expedition, and contributions to the Utopia Foundation communal habitation project. This versatile craft is plated with radiation-resistant armour, and engineered with an aerodynamic profile for agility during atmospheric flight. Claim<> this ship to add it to your collection, or Exchange<> it with your current ship. While on a planet, summon ships from the Quick Menu (QUICK_MENU<>).

5.RewardDescription:
Equip this exclusive <STELLAR>Personal Flair<> in commemoration of the <STELLAR>Utopia<> expedition, and contributions to the Utopia Foundation communal habitation project.

Apply this banner to your profile at an <TECHNOLOGY>Appearance Modifier<>.

An exclusive placeable decal, to add flair and decoration to bases.

This decal commemorates completion of the <STELLAR>Utopia<> expedition, and contributions to the Utopia Foundation communal habitation project.

An exclusive <STELLAR>Explorer Title<>, commemorating completion of the <STELLAR>Utopia<> expedition, and contributions to the Utopia Foundation communal habitation project.

Apply this title to your banner at an <TECHNOLOGY>Appearance Modifier<>.

4.RewardDescription:
A metal 'egg' capsule, <TRADEABLE>ready to hatch!<>

A regular electronic beeping can be heard from within the egg, soft and somehow reassuring.

Scans indicate the being within is programmed to be <SPECIAL>meticulous<> and <SPECIAL>dependable<>.

3.RewardDescription:
An exclusive <STELLAR>Exosuit Appearance Override<>.

Strike dread into the hearts of your foes with this oxide-strengthened helmet.

Transform the appearance of your Exosuit at an <TECHNOLOGY>Appearance Modifier<>.

2.RewardDescription: An exclusive buildable base ornament. This holographic Gek attendant provides eternal friendship to even the loneliest of habitable bases.

1.RewardDescription:
An exclusive piece of self-adhesive, crease-proof wall art.
This poster captures a towering skyline within the Utopia Foundation communal habitation project.

An exclusive piece of self-adhesive, crease-proof wall art.
This poster depicts an inter-species friendship between three explorers of the universe.

An exclusive piece of self-adhesive, crease-proof wall art.
This poster echoes the ongoing tensions between the galaxies' dominant lifeforms.

10.Description: Solve a mystery that echoes deep within the fabric of reality

-1.RewardDescription:
An exclusive <STELLAR>Exosuit Appearance Override<>.

The circuit cage and primary control sensors for a <TECHNOLOGY>primitive automaton<>. Plans for a unit of this design were extracted from an <STELLAR>autophage<> left at an abandoned junker's camp, before being infused with <SPECIAL>Atlantideum<>.

Transform the appearance of your Exosuit at an <TECHNOLOGY>Appearance Modifier<>.

An exclusive <STELLAR>Exosuit Appearance Override<>.

The circuit cage and primary control sensors for a <TECHNOLOGY>primitive automaton<>. Plans for a unit of this design were extracted from an <STELLAR>autophage<> left at an abandoned junker's camp, before being infused with an <FUEL>Atlas Seed<>.

Transform the appearance of your Exosuit at an <TECHNOLOGY>Appearance Modifier<>.

An exclusive <STELLAR>Exosuit Appearance Override<>.

A set of complex hydraulic tubes and various gripping surfaces that form a pair of usable arms for a <TECHNOLOGY>primitive automaton<>. Plans for a unit of this design were extracted from an <STELLAR>autophage<> left at an abandoned junker's camp.

Transform the appearance of your Exosuit at an <TECHNOLOGY>Appearance Modifier<>.

An exclusive <STELLAR>Exosuit Appearance Override<>.

The principal metallic carapace for a <TECHNOLOGY>primitive automaton<>. Plans for a unit of this design were extracted from an <STELLAR>autophage<> left at an abandoned junker's camp.

Transform the appearance of your Exosuit at an <TECHNOLOGY>Appearance Modifier<>.

An exclusive <STELLAR>Exosuit Appearance Override<>.

A pair of fleshless feet for a <TECHNOLOGY>primitive automaton<>. Plans for a unit of this design were extracted from an <STELLAR>autophage<> left at an abandoned junker's camp.

Transform the appearance of your Exosuit at an <TECHNOLOGY>Appearance Modifier<>.

An exclusive <STELLAR>Exosuit Appearance Override<>.

A bipedal movement platform for a <TECHNOLOGY>primitive automaton<>. Plans for a unit of this design were extracted from an <STELLAR>autophage<> left at an abandoned junker's camp.

Transform the appearance of your Exosuit at an <TECHNOLOGY>Appearance Modifier<>.

5.RewardDescription:
Equip this exclusive <STELLAR>Personal Flair<> in commemoration of the <STELLAR>Singularity<> expedition, and the forging of the mysterious Construct.

Apply this banner to your profile at an <TECHNOLOGY>Appearance Modifier<>.

An exclusive placeable decal, to add flair and decoration to bases.

This decal commemorates completion of the <STELLAR>Singularity<> expedition, and the forging of the mysterious Construct.

An exclusive <STELLAR>Explorer Title<>, commemorating completion of the <STELLAR>Singularity<> expedition, and the forging of the mysterious Construct.

Apply this title to your banner at an <TECHNOLOGY>Appearance Modifier<>.

4.RewardDescription:
An exclusive <STELLAR>Exosuit Appearance Override<>.

Despite its aerodynamic appearance and advanced solar design, reliance on helmet-exclusive propulsion is not advised. For maximum safety, ensure all body parts are propelled equally.

Transform the appearance of your Exosuit at an <TECHNOLOGY>Appearance Modifier<>.

3.RewardDescription:
An exclusive buildable base ornament.

This is a detailed replica of the Living Fragments that litter discordant worlds, the prismatic grains that thrust from the earth in a struggle for freedom from their geological prison.

2.RewardDescription:
An exclusive <STELLAR>Exosuit Appearance Override<>.

The jetpack exhaust is augmented with an atlantideum filter. When activated, its discordant effect is spilled across the landscape, a trail of dissonant reverberations that echo on an unknowable frequency.

Transform the appearance of your Exosuit at an <TECHNOLOGY>Appearance Modifier<>.

An exclusive <STELLAR>Freighter Engine Flare Modifier<>.

A harmonic generation device converts the output of the freighter engines to <FUEL>A T L A S<> frequencies, radiating a painfully crimson trail.

Transform the appearance of your freighter at the <TECHNOLOGY>Upgrade Control Terminal<> on the <VAL_ON>bridge<>.

1.RewardDescription:
An exclusive piece of self-adhesive, crease-proof wall art.

This poster depicts a possible schematic for the mysterious <TECHNOLOGY>Construct<> unearthed during the Singularity expedition.

An exclusive piece of self-adhesive, crease-proof wall art.

This poster depicts the ethereal substance that spills from the bodies of <SPECIAL>corrupted Sentinels<> as they fall.

An exclusive piece of self-adhesive, crease-proof wall art.

This poster glows with a <FUEL>crimson<> so intense, it lingers when you close your eyes.

11.Description: Explore the universe and catalogue its marvels

-1.RewardDescription:
A metal 'egg' capsule, <TRADEABLE>ready to deploy!<>

A low hum resonates from deep within the capsule, its dissonant frequency turning the air around it a faint purple.

Scans indicate the being within is programmed to be <SPECIAL>free-spirited<> and <SPECIAL>defiant<>.

5.RewardDescription:
Equip this exclusive <STELLAR>Personal Flair<> in commemoration of the <STELLAR>Voyagers<> expedition, and the discoveries made along the way.

Apply this banner to your profile at an <TECHNOLOGY>Appearance Modifier<>.

An exclusive <STELLAR>Explorer Title<>, commemorating completion of the <STELLAR>Voyagers<> expedition, and the discoveries made along the way.

Apply this title to your banner at an <TECHNOLOGY>Appearance Modifier<>.

An exclusive placeable decal, to add flair and decoration to bases.

This decal commemorates completion of the <STELLAR>Voyagers<> expedition, and the discoveries made along the way.

4.RewardDescription:
An exclusive buildable base ornament.

This is a detailed replica of an Autophage facial cage. The unit is inoperable and contains no trace of Autophage entity inhabitation...

An exclusive buildable base ornament.

A partially assembled robotic hand, as seen on mechanical lifeforms across the galaxy. The unit is severly damaged and appears to contain no trace of Autophage entity inhabitation...

An exclusive buildable base ornament.

A makeshift planetary shelter, assembled out of rudimentary and salvaged materials.

3.RewardDescription:
An exclusive <STELLAR>Companion Appearance Enhancement<>. This biomechanical remnant is a constant reminder of the many and diverse forms that existence can take.

Earn the trust of wild animals to adopt companions. Interact with companions to customise their appearance.

2.RewardDescription:
An exclusive piece of self-adhesive, crease-proof wall art.

This poster celebrates those in search of the next discovery, the next wonder, and the next unknown sky...

An exclusive piece of self-adhesive, crease-proof wall art.

This poster depicts one of the universe's great mysteries, the anomaly of existence itself.

An exclusive piece of self-adhesive, crease-proof wall art.

This poster celebrates those who plot new routes into the unknown, always pushing at the boundaries of reality.

1.RewardDescription:
An exclusive <STELLAR>Exosuit Appearance Override<>.

Humidifiers discharge a highly salinated mist from the rocket nozzles, conducting a dramatic streak of electricity during Jetpack operation.

Transform the appearance of your Exosuit at an <TECHNOLOGY>Appearance Modifier<>.

12.Description: Begin a journey that has no end, on an infinite road into the stars.

5.RewardDescription:
Equip this exclusive <STELLAR>Personal Flair<> in commemoration of the <STELLAR>Omega<> expedition, and the memories gleaned from within the Atlas.

Apply this banner to your profile at an <TECHNOLOGY>Appearance Modifier<>.

An exclusive <STELLAR>Explorer Title<>, commemorating completion of the <STELLAR>Omega<> expedition, and the memories gleaned from within the Atlas.

Apply this title to your banner at an <TECHNOLOGY>Appearance Modifier<>.

An exclusive placeable decal, to add flair and decoration to bases.

This decal commemorates completion of the <STELLAR>Omega<> expedition, and the memories gleaned from within the Atlas.

-1.RewardDescription: A unique and exclusive starship<>, commemorating completion of the Omega<> expedition. This unusual starship is optimised for effortless gliding during flight, while a localised vector field allows the craft to hover above solid planes. Claim<> this ship to add it to your collection, or Exchange<> it with your current ship. While on a planet, summon ships from the Quick Menu (QUICK_MENU<>).

4.RewardDescription:
An exclusive <STELLAR>Exosuit Appearance Override<>.

A lightweight jetpack, welded from stellar alloys around a fiery crimson core.

Transform the appearance of your Exosuit at an <TECHNOLOGY>Appearance Modifier<>.

3.RewardDescription: An exclusive Multi-Tool<>. This unusual ceremonial staff was hand-forged by a Korvax Priest Entity in tribute to the Atlas. Take<> this Multi-Tool to add it to your collection, or Exchange<> it with your current Multi-Tool. Swap between active Multi-Tools from the Utilities section of the Quick Menu (QUICK_MENU<>).

2.RewardDescription:
An exclusive <STELLAR>Exosuit Appearance Override<>.

A soft but immutable heartbeat resonates through your skull when you wear this helmet. <FUEL>A T L A S<>.
The pulse is strangely soothing.

Transform the appearance of your Exosuit at an <TECHNOLOGY>Appearance Modifier<>.

1.RewardDescription:
An exclusive piece of self-adhesive, crease-proof wall art.

The Traveller approaches, delicately piloting their tiny ship through the stars.
The Atlas, infinite, waits.

An exclusive piece of self-adhesive, crease-proof wall art.

This poster depicts an infinite array of Atlas Interfaces, crimson eyes staring tirelessly into the dark.

An exclusive piece of self-adhesive, crease-proof wall art.

This poster holds the seeds of what was, what is, what could be.

13.Description: Alone in an empty universe, the Adrift Expedition redefines what it means to survive among the stars...

5.RewardDescription:
An exclusive <STELLAR>Explorer Title<>, commemorating completion of the <STELLAR>Adrift<> expedition, and to finding peace in a lonely universe.

Apply this title to your banner at an <TECHNOLOGY>Appearance Modifier<>.

An exclusive placeable decal, to add flair and decoration to bases.

This decal commemorates completion of the <STELLAR>Adrift<> expedition, and to finding peace in a lonely universe.

Equip this exclusive <STELLAR>Personal Flair<> in commemoration of the <STELLAR>Adrift<> expedition, and to finding peace in a lonely universe.

Apply this banner to your profile at an <TECHNOLOGY>Appearance Modifier<>.

-1.RewardDescription: A unique and exclusive starship<>, commemorating completion of the Adrift<> expedition. Claim<> this ship to add it to your collection, or Exchange<> it with your current ship. While on a planet, summon ships from the Quick Menu (QUICK_MENU<>).

An exclusive starship customisation option, creating a unique well-worn appearance for <STELLAR>Fighter<> and <STELLAR>Hauler<> class starships.

Acquire starship components by breaking down existing ships at the <TECHNOLOGY>Starship Outfitting<> unit aboard any space station. Visit the <TECHNOLOGY>Starship Fabricator<> to design and assemble a new vessel.

4.RewardDescription:
The remains of a long-abandoned <STELLAR>frigate<>. Despite its ruined condition, it sails on through the stars...

Recruiting this vessel will add it to your frigate fleet. Manage your fleet from a <TECHNOLOGY>Fleet Command Room<> aboard your freighter, and consult your <TECHNOLOGY>Navigator<> to deploy frigates on lucrative expeditions.

3.RewardDescription:
A living, fertile egg, <TRADEABLE>ready to hatch!<>

A shadow writhes beneath the egg's protective membrane.

Scans indicate the being within has the genetic potential to be <FUEL>nightmarish<> and <FUEL>soul-consuming<>.

1.RewardDescription:
An exclusive starship customisation option, creating a unique low-radar-signature look for <STELLAR>Fighter<> and <STELLAR>Hauler<> class starships.

Acquire starship components by breaking down existing ships at the <TECHNOLOGY>Starship Outfitting<> unit aboard any space station. Visit the <TECHNOLOGY>Starship Fabricator<> to design and assemble a new vessel.

An exclusive piece of self-adhesive, crease-proof wall art.

This poster is for those who face the black expanse alone.

An exclusive piece of self-adhesive, crease-proof wall art.

This poster stands a reminder of how impossibly small every Traveller is when compared to the infinite void that surrounds us.

An exclusive piece of self-adhesive, crease-proof wall art.

A poster to contemplate as your mind soars through the empty endless void of space...

2.RewardDescription:
An exclusive buildable base ornament.

The shattered remains of a crashed starship, this shell of a ship has rotted beyond the point of any useful salvage.

An exclusive buildable base ornament.

The shattered remains of a crashed starship, this shell of a ship has rotted beyond the point of any useful salvage.

An exclusive buildable base ornament.

The shattered remains of a crashed starship, this shell of a ship has rotted beyond the point of any useful salvage.

The shattered remains of a crashed starship, this shell of a ship has rotted beyond the point of any useful salvage.

An exclusive buildable base ornament.

The shattered remains of a crashed starship, this shell of a ship has rotted beyond the point of any useful salvage.

14.Description: The vile brood spread their corruption across the universe... Join the Liquidators Expedition and purge the rot from the stars!

5.RewardDescription:
A writhing cocoon, the spawning sac of a grub of the <TRADEABLE>vile brood<>.

Scans indicate the being within has <SPECIAL>anomalous<> genetic material, an <FUEL>unstable<> binding of several independent strands.

An exclusive <STELLAR>Explorer Title<>, commemorating the glorious triumph <STELLAR>Liquidators<> expedition, and the victory over the endless swarm.

Apply this title to your banner at an <TECHNOLOGY>Appearance Modifier<>.

An exclusive placeable decal, to add flair and decoration to bases.

This decal commemorates the glorious triumph <STELLAR>Liquidators<> expedition, and the victory over the endless swarm.

Equip this exclusive <STELLAR>Personal Flair<> in commemoration of the glorious triumph <STELLAR>Liquidators<> expedition!

Apply this banner to your profile at an <TECHNOLOGY>Appearance Modifier<>.

-1.RewardDescription:
An exclusive <STELLAR>Exosuit Appearance Override<>.

A fusion of advanced technology and resinous organic secretions, this jetpack replacement represents the apex of bio-organic engineering.

Transform the appearance of your Exosuit at an <TECHNOLOGY>Appearance Modifier<>.

4.RewardDescription:
An exclusive <STELLAR>Exosuit Appearance Override<>.

A fusion of advanced technology and resinous organic secretions, this hardened carapace represents the apex of bio-organic engineering.

Transform the appearance of your Exosuit at an <TECHNOLOGY>Appearance Modifier<>.

An exclusive <STELLAR>Exosuit Appearance Override<>.

A fusion of advanced technology and resinous organic secretions, this insectoid helmet represents the apex of bio-organic engineering.

Transform the appearance of your Exosuit at an <TECHNOLOGY>Appearance Modifier<>.

3.RewardDescription:
An exclusive <STELLAR>Exosuit Appearance Override<>.

A fusion of advanced technology and resinous organic secretions, these protective claws represent the apex of bio-organic engineering.

Transform the appearance of your Exosuit at an <TECHNOLOGY>Appearance Modifier<>.

An exclusive <STELLAR>Exosuit Appearance Override<>.

A fusion of advanced technology and resinous organic secretions, these feet-replacements represent the apex of bio-organic engineering.

Transform the appearance of your Exosuit at an <TECHNOLOGY>Appearance Modifier<>.

1.RewardDescription:
An exclusive piece of self-adhesive, crease-proof wall art.

This poster resonates with the busy hum of the hive, a binding music that keeps the brood as one...

An exclusive piece of self-adhesive, crease-proof wall art.

The vile queen looms from this poster, a warning to all those who would disturb her brood...

An exclusive piece of self-adhesive, crease-proof wall art.

An educational poster, useful for all those who seek to identify insects, for good or for ill...

2.RewardDescription:
An exclusive buildable base ornament.

The mounted head of a colossal insect, this is a trophy from the glorious work of the Liquidators.

An exclusive buildable base ornament.

The mounted head of a colossal insect, this is a trophy from the glorious work of the Liquidators.

An exclusive buildable base ornament.

The mounted head of a colossal insect, this is a trophy from the glorious work of the Liquidators.

An exclusive buildable base ornament.

The mounted head of a colossal insect, this is a trophy from the glorious work of the Liquidators.

An exclusive buildable base ornament.

The mounted head of a colossal insect, this is a trophy from the glorious work of the Liquidators.

15.Description: Join the Aquarius Expedition to catch fish, gather stories, and think about the one that got away...

-1.RewardDescription:
An exclusive <STELLAR>Exosuit Appearance Override<>.

Hardened against the extreme conditions found beneath the waves, this jetpack replacement allows for smooth and stylish passage through the murky abyss.

Transform the appearance of your Exosuit at an <TECHNOLOGY>Appearance Modifier<>.

4.RewardDescription: A versatile piece of angling equipment<>, enabling the user to fish<> in a variety of water conditions. This rig was once owned by the legendary Lost Angler<>. Access the fishing rig by pressing CYCLEWEAPON<> and cast your line into a body of water with ATTACK<>. With a fish hooked, press and hold ATTACK<> to haul in your catch.

3.RewardDescription:
An exclusive <STELLAR>Exosuit Appearance Override<>.

Hardened against the extreme conditions found beneath the waves, this diving suit component is the perfect choice for both deep-water exploration and an afternoon's fishing.

Transform the appearance of your Exosuit at an <TECHNOLOGY>Appearance Modifier<>.

An exclusive <STELLAR>Exosuit Appearance Override<>.

Hardened against the extreme conditions found beneath the waves, this diving suit component is the perfect choice for both deep-water exploration and an afternoon's fishing.

Transform the appearance of your Exosuit at an <TECHNOLOGY>Appearance Modifier<>.

2.RewardDescription:
An exclusive <STELLAR>Exosuit Appearance Override<>.

Hardened against the extreme conditions found beneath the waves, this diving suit component is the perfect choice for both deep-water exploration and an afternoon's fishing.

Transform the appearance of your Exosuit at an <TECHNOLOGY>Appearance Modifier<>.

An exclusive <STELLAR>Exosuit Appearance Override<>.

Hardened against the extreme conditions found beneath the waves, this diving suit component is the perfect choice for both deep-water exploration and an afternoon's fishing.

Transform the appearance of your Exosuit at an <TECHNOLOGY>Appearance Modifier<>.

1.RewardDescription:
An exclusive piece of self-adhesive, crease-proof wall art.

This poster celebrates the need to get away from distractions and spend some time on and/or in the water.

An exclusive piece of self-adhesive, crease-proof wall art.

A poster to help sailors navigate treacherous depths and shifting sands...

An exclusive piece of self-adhesive, crease-proof wall art.

An educational poster, useful for all those who seek to identify the teeming bounty of the ocean.

5.RewardDescription:
An exclusive <STELLAR>Explorer Title<>, commemorating the catches, the stories, and the ones that got away while on the <STELLAR>Aquarius<> expedition.

Apply this title to your banner at an <TECHNOLOGY>Appearance Modifier<>.

Equip this exclusive <STELLAR>Personal Flair<> in commemoration of the <STELLAR>Aquarius<> expedition.

Apply this banner to your profile at an <TECHNOLOGY>Appearance Modifier<>.

A synthetic polymer companion for your starship's cockpit, fashioned in the likeness of a sea creature.

Install to an <TECHNOLOGY>Inventory Slot<> to decorate your ship's interior.

An exclusive placeable decal, to add flair and decoration to bases.

This decal commemorates the catches, the stories, and the ones that got away while on the <STELLAR>Aquarius<> expedition.

16.Description: Join the Cursed Expedition to travel beyond the boundaries and cross over into a universe of haunting anomalies...

-1.RewardDescription: An exclusive starship<>, retrieved while escaping the reality collapse that occurred during the Cursed Expedition<>. Claim<> this ship to add it to your collection, or Exchange<> it with your current ship. While on a planet, summon ships from the Quick Menu (QUICK_MENU<>).

4.RewardDescription:
A living, fertile egg, <TRADEABLE>ready to hatch!<>

A living fire burns within the egg, the haunting pale glow of a lifeform that must provide its own light.

Scans indicate the being within has the genetic potential to be <SPECIAL>gelatinous<> and <STELLAR>luminescent<>.

3.RewardDescription:
An exclusive <STELLAR>Exosuit Appearance Override<>.

Transform your appearance into that of a <SPECIAL>Boundary Horror<>, a fragment of what dwells beyond the tunnels of the portal network...

Transform the appearance of your Exosuit at an <TECHNOLOGY>Appearance Modifier<>.

2.RewardDescription:
As the boundaries of reality begin to weaken, the risk of <SPECIAL>catastrophic breach anomalies<> increases.

This ancient artifact radiates with a spectral energy, increasing the <SPECIAL>boundary strength<> within the local area and guarding against reality continuity errors.

Must be constructed within the boundaries of a <STELLAR>habitable base<>.

An exclusive <STELLAR>Exosuit Appearance Override<>.

A localised anomaly within the jetpack's core allows the spectral afterglow of the <SPECIAL>boundary horrors<> to leak across into this reality.

Transform the appearance of your Exosuit at an <TECHNOLOGY>Appearance Modifier<>.

1.RewardDescription:
An exclusive piece of self-adhesive, crease-proof wall art.

This poster serves as a warning to all those who would venture into the tunnels of portal network...

An exclusive piece of self-adhesive, crease-proof wall art.

Beware what lurks beyond the boundary wall...

An exclusive piece of self-adhesive, crease-proof wall art.

A poster for those who wish to study the ancient runes etched into the cold grey stone of the <SPECIAL>portals<>.

5.RewardDescription:
An exclusive <STELLAR>Explorer Title<>, marking the escape from the boundary failure that occurred during the <SPECIAL>Cursed<> expedition.

Apply this title to your banner at an <TECHNOLOGY>Appearance Modifier<>.

Equip this exclusive <STELLAR>Personal Flair<> in commemoration of the <STELLAR>Cursed<> expedition.

Apply this banner to your profile at an <TECHNOLOGY>Appearance Modifier<>.

An exclusive placeable decal, to add flair and decoration to bases.

This decal marks the escape from the boundary failure that occurred during the <SPECIAL>Cursed<> expedition...

17.Description: Join the Titan Expedition on a voyage through a dazzling array of new worlds and new stars...

-1.RewardDescription: An exclusive starship<>, earned for surveying a host of new worlds during the Titan Expedition<>. Claim<> this ship to add it to your collection, or Exchange<> it with your current ship. While on a planet, summon ships from the Quick Menu (QUICK_MENU<>).

5.RewardDescription:
An exclusive <STELLAR>Explorer Title<>, marking the <STELLAR>Titan<> expedition's voyage through new stars and new worlds.

Apply this title to your banner at an <TECHNOLOGY>Appearance Modifier<>.

An exclusive placeable decal, to add flair and decoration to bases.

This decal marks the <STELLAR>Titan<> expedition's voyage through new stars and new worlds.

Equip this exclusive <STELLAR>Personal Flair<> in commemoration of the <STELLAR>Titan<> expedition.

Apply this banner to your profile at an <TECHNOLOGY>Appearance Modifier<>.

4.RewardDescription: An exclusive Multi-Tool<>. This sturdy staff is hewn from polished stone, and yet floats in the hand as if it were no weight at all. It is a perfect companion to those who seek to make long trips across the wilderness. Take<> this Multi-Tool to add it to your collection, or Exchange<> it with your current Multi-Tool. Swap between active Multi-Tools from the Utilities section of the Quick Menu (QUICK_MENU<>).

3.RewardDescription:
An exclusive <STELLAR>Exosuit Appearance Override<>.

A robust and well-made covering: waterproof, windproof and designed to keep the wearer protected against anything they may encounter while exploring unmapped worlds.
Transform the appearance of your Exosuit at an <TECHNOLOGY>Appearance Modifier<>.

2.RewardDescription:
An exclusive starship customisation option, creating a vibrant and eye-catching appearance for <STELLAR>Fighter<> and <STELLAR>Hauler<> class starships.

Acquire starship components by breaking down existing ships at the <TECHNOLOGY>Starship Outfitting<> unit aboard any space station. Visit the <TECHNOLOGY>Starship Fabricator<> to design and assemble a new vessel.

1.RewardDescription:
An exclusive piece of self-adhesive, crease-proof wall art.

This poster shows the titanic form of a <SPECIAL>gas giant<> and its surrounding moons.

An exclusive piece of self-adhesive, crease-proof wall art.

This poster serves as a warning to all those who venture in the deepest of oceans...

An exclusive piece of self-adhesive, crease-proof wall art.

A planetary map, designed to show the detailed survey results gathered during the exploration of unmapped worlds.

18.Description: Join the Relics Expedition to unearth ancient treasures and recreate the lost beasts of the past...

-1.RewardDescription:
An exclusive <STELLAR>Exosuit Appearance Override<>.

A powerful magnetic field runs through this ancient stone, turning lumpen rock into something almost alive. The carver of this effigy is unknown.

Transform the appearance of your Exosuit at an <TECHNOLOGY>Appearance Modifier<>.

An exclusive <STELLAR>Exosuit Appearance Override<>.

A powerful magnetic field runs through this ancient stone, turning lumpen rock into something almost alive. The carver of this effigy is unknown.

Transform the appearance of your Exosuit at an <TECHNOLOGY>Appearance Modifier<>.

An exclusive <STELLAR>Exosuit Appearance Override<>.

A powerful magnetic field runs through this ancient stone, turning lumpen rock into something almost alive. The carver of this effigy is unknown.

Transform the appearance of your Exosuit at an <TECHNOLOGY>Appearance Modifier<>.

An exclusive <STELLAR>Exosuit Appearance Override<>.

A powerful magnetic field runs through this ancient stone, turning lumpen rock into something almost alive. The carver of this effigy is unknown.

Transform the appearance of your Exosuit at an <TECHNOLOGY>Appearance Modifier<>.

An exclusive <STELLAR>Exosuit Appearance Override<>.

A powerful magnetic field runs through this ancient stone, turning lumpen rock into something almost alive. The carver of this effigy is unknown.

Transform the appearance of your Exosuit at an <TECHNOLOGY>Appearance Modifier<>.

An exclusive <STELLAR>Exosuit Appearance Override<>.

A powerful magnetic field runs through this ancient stone, turning lumpen rock into something almost alive. The carver of this effigy is unknown.

Transform the appearance of your Exosuit at an <TECHNOLOGY>Appearance Modifier<>.

5.RewardDescription:
An exclusive <STELLAR>Explorer Title<>, marking the <STELLAR>Relics<> expedition's voyage through new stars and new worlds.

Apply this title to your banner at an <TECHNOLOGY>Appearance Modifier<>.

An exclusive placeable decal, to add flair and decoration to bases.

This decal marks the <STELLAR>Relics<> expedition's voyage of discovery and the recreation of the lost beasts of the past.

Equip this exclusive <STELLAR>Personal Flair<> in commemoration of the <STELLAR>Relics<> expedition.

Apply this banner to your profile at an <TECHNOLOGY>Appearance Modifier<>.

4.RewardDescription:
An exclusive <STELLAR>Exosuit Appearance Override<>.

An unusual alternative to the traditional jetpack, this flight device is sculpted from the remains of sentient rock. Magmatic gases provide the hardpack's thrust, while an anti-gravity field supports the weight of the stone, ensuring ergonomic safety for the user.

Transform the appearance of your Exosuit at an <TECHNOLOGY>Appearance Modifier<>.

3.RewardDescription: An exclusive Multi-Tool<>. The skull of an ancient beast sits atop this fused pillar of bone and circuitry. Beware its gaze... Take<> this Multi-Tool to add it to your collection, or Exchange<> it with your current Multi-Tool. Swap between active Multi-Tools from the Utilities section of the Quick Menu (QUICK_MENU<>).

2.RewardDescription:
A living, fertile egg, <TRADEABLE>ready to hatch!<>

A foetal creature of bone grows inside, its delicate body suspended in vitellus. Its fleshless limbs are comprised of soft cartilage, which will harden and densify as it grows. 

Scans indicate the being within has the genetic potential to be <SPECIAL>skeletal<> and <STELLAR>elephantine<>.

1.RewardDescription:
An exclusive piece of self-adhesive, crease-proof wall art.

Show off the simplicity of nature with these attractive shells.

An exclusive piece of self-adhesive, crease-proof wall art.

A lovely catalogue of different skulls, in case you need a reference.

An exclusive piece of self-adhesive, crease-proof wall art.

A poster for those that want to celebrate creatures not bound to solid ground.
